text: Logan Sargeant (born December 31, 2000) is an American racing driver. He is currently competing in the 2020 FIA Formula 3 Championship for Prema alongside Frederik Vesti, and Oscar Piastri. ==Career== Sargeant won the Karting Federation Junior championship in 2015, becoming the first American to win an FIA karting championship since 1978, when Lake Speed won. The following year, he ran the Formula 4 UAE Championship, finishing second in points. In 2017, Sargeant joined Carlin to run the F4 British Championship, finishing third. The following year, he drove for R-ace GP in the Formula Renault Eurocup.
